entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Analyzer Proposal] Warn on subsequent OrderBy calls; fix those into ThenBy #58591
  • WinHttp tests with Tls 1.3 are failing #58587
  • [Libraries][iOS] Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical PhysicalFileProviderTests failure #58584
  • DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync throws TaskCanceledException with wrong CancellationToken #58583
  • System.IO.EnumerationOptions.IgnoreInaccessible has undesirable behavior #58581
  • handle that content-encoding can lie #58568
  • In .NET 6, Preview 7, having a property name with space and using JsonSourceGenerationOptions causes errors in generated files #58580
  • Build workload artifacts step failing in official builds #58561
  • Jit should avoid allocations for T1 is T2 pattern in generics #58554
    Future
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile due to CS0246 and CS0265 errors if type for generic constraint is in a different namespace #58550
    7.0.0
  • runtime-staging (i.e. iOS and tvOS) legs are timing out in PRs #58549
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm Neon Intrinsics - float AddAcross is missing, eg vaddvq_f32 #58547
  • [API Proposal]: TraceSource add Write serie methods #58546
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(gcInfo.gcRegGCrefSetCur & (RBM_CALLEE_TRASH & ~RBM_ARG_REGS)) == 0' #58539
    6.0.0
  • Multi-targeting strategy for Json and Logging Source Generators for 6.0 NuGet packages #58536
  • Rounding out unmanaged feature via properties on Type and a managed type constraint #58534

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'm_compGenTreeID == m_compiler->compGenTreeID' during 'Morph - Inlining' #58397
    7.0.0
  • Regression in System.Drawing.Tests.Perf_Color #58443
    6.0.0
  • Error publishing .NET 5.x Blazor App using Visual Studio #57430
    6.0.0
  • `StringValues` implicit conversion to `string` should match `ToString()` #58223
  • Test failure Interop/ICustomMarshaler/Primitives/ICustomMarshaler_TargetUnix/ICustomMarshaler_TargetUnix.sh #58335
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M09.5-PDC/b31448/b31448/b31448.sh #44011
    7.0.0
  • JIT: [QualityWeek] Random edge counts assert in System.Text.Encoding.Tests #58372
    7.0.0
  • Servicing Readiness Tasks for .NET 6 #58042
    6.0.0
  • Dump generation segfaults in DAC and doesn't complete #58525
    6.0.0
  • [Mono][AOT][LLVM][Linux] JIT.Performance.XUnitWrapper Test Failure SIGSEGV #58556
  • System.Text.Json code generator: custom converter ignored? #58119
    6.0.0
  • HttpClient headers extension #58425
    7.0.0
  • At high concurresion, WebSocket.State has different values in different threads #58451
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 Android AOT fails on certain folder names #56163
    6.0.0
  • Mono MacCatalyst AOT offsets leg failing in official buidls #58563
  • Console.Write prints a new line on iOS #36440
    6.0.0
  • [CoreCLR] Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation.FrameworkResolution.RollForwardOnNoCandidateFx.RollForwardOnMinor_RollOverPreRelease Test failure HostActivation.Tests_net6.0_x86 #58501
  • Core Managed libraries size-reduction for WebAssembly #44530
    6.0.0
  • Epic: .NET libraries are annotated to support trimming and we provide trimming guidance for library authors #43543
    6.0.0
  • MSVC's C++23 `<stdatomic.h>` breaks the CoreCLR build #57618
  • Rename/consolidate NgenHashTable in CoreCLR #58048
  • Thread suspension comments should be updated or code removed #58466
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add threading test for Regex #58595
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • only cache credentials on success #58594
    area-System.Net.Security
  • fix spelling #58593
    area-System.Net.Security, auto-merge
  • Address Windows recommendations for Link APIs #58592
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • add TLS 1.3 support to WinHttp #58590
    area-System.Net.Http, os-windows
  • Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Win11 RIDs #58588
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Android device issues related to filesystem/IO #58586
    area-System.IO, os-android
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Don't add unbox tramopline on generic DIM calls #58585
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Undo struct promotion on "RetInd" code path #58582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • JIT: fix jump threading to keep track of preds instead of reanalyzing #58579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Building Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    area-Build-mono
  • [main] Conditionally pack symbols based on keepNativeSymbols #58577
    area-System.IO
  • [WIP][Donot review] use arcade power source build scripts #58576
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Pass a null getter\setter with [JsonIgnore] and src gen #58572
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Disable fast path serialization for types with properties using custom converters. #58571
    area-System.Text.Json
  • add W11 test queue #58570
    area-Infrastructure
  • handle that content-encoding can lie #58567
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Ensure proper memory ordering in allocator::copy_with_no_repair #58564
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Libraries] Fix TimeZoneInfoTests IsIanaIdTest for iOS/MacCatalyst/tvOS #58562
  • Fix Console.Write on iOS (#56713) #58559
    area-System.Console
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms #58558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Improve error messages expanding single-file #58557
    area-Single-File, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] win32 implementation of g_get_current_dir #58555
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix source-build on the s390x platform #58553
    community-contribution
  • Add perfmap debug directory entry to crossgen2 output as needed #58552
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Send RST_STREAM instead EOF when sending request body is cancelled #58548
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Skip eventpipe_readevents for arm32 #58545
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Stress disable offending op causing server errors #58541
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Cleaned up version of earlier PR #48601. #58544
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] In reset_memory, check settings.entry_memory_load ... #58543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • docs: add missing xml document's comments #57329
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Clean up tests under CoreMangLib/system/runtime/interopservices/safehandle #58528
    area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • Convert test from using XUnitBase to typical CoreCLR test pattern so #58573
    area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix trim_youngest_desired #58538
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fix content stream read hang #58460
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • JIT: fix some issues in fgIsThrowHlpBlk #58510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use new Hosted build pools #58484
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Conditionally pack symbols based on keepNativeSymbols #58565
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Fix dump generation segfault in DAC #58537
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Delete redundant AssemblyName test #58477
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58472
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58533
    area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Change compile time dependency of ICU API ucol_setMaxVariable to be runtime instead. #58485
    area-System.Globalization
  • Pass a null getter\setter with [JsonIgnore] and src gen #58405
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Disable fast path serialization for types with properties using custom converters. #58291
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Schedule HTTP & SSL stress runs for release/6.0 #58272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Turn off release branch in perf-slow.yml for release/6.0 #58512
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reenable a few OperatingSystem tests on MacCatalyst #58428
  • Move the implementation of Win32Exception into System.Private.CoreLib #58529
    area-Microsoft.Win32, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • [mono] win32 implementation of g_get_current_dir #58523
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #57445
    area-DependencyModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix Console.Write on iOS #56713
    area-System.Console, os-ios, 6.0.0
  • Fix a few incorrect .NETFramework target frameworks #58499
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58516
  • [Main] Don't always build source build with ci flag #58497
  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720
    increase-code-coverage
  • Run runtime tests marked as JitOptimizationSensitive on Mono. #58106
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] [MonoVM] Fix calculation of code size for AOT assemblies mixing JIT and LLVM #58503
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix dump generation segfault in DAC #58530
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Convert the check for stdatomic.h into a compile step as opposed to existence check #58532
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • Rename NGenHashTable to DacEnumerableHashTable to describe its unique feature and remove dead code #58080
    area-VM-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Update native COM server tests to execute directly instead of using the Exe launcher program. #58302
    test enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Delete shutdown special handling in a few CoreCLR PAL methods #58513
    area-PAL-coreclr

Updated

  • Multi-target LoggerMessageGenerator between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #58410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement support for passing a .env file to corerun to easily set environment variables for stress testing. #58222
    area-Host, auto-merge
  • Add support for build.cmd -vs corehost.sln #58520
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Import `KEEPALIVE(BOX)` as `KEEPALIVE(ADDR(TEMP))` #54412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, auto-merge, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • #58181 Fix NullReferenceException in crossgen2. #58183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace constant strings with SyntaxKind #57898
    area-Extensions-Logging, 7.0.0
  • Check Options validations length instead of null #58157
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • DependencyContextWriter.WritePortableTarget(): write the duplicate key name when duplicate keys are detected #57860
    area-DependencyModel, 7.0.0
  • Handle file-scoped namespaces in Logging Source Generator #57894
    area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.0
  • LoggerMessage formatter performance improvements #58524
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mini] Don't add unbox tramopline on generic DIM calls #58521
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use CustomCommand to run runtime tests for mobile targets on helix #57292
    area-Infrastructure
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
  • Support duplicated type names with src gen #58448
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Fix crossgen2 calli GC hole by unifying MethodDesc/MethodSignature IsMarshallingRequired logic #58430
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58398
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • Refactor symmetric one-shots for improved performance #58270
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for non-seekable files to RandomAccess #58506
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Run minimal set of iOS / tvOS device tests #58444
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [.NET 5.0] Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58412
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.11
  • Reflection nullability API: improve test coverage #58479
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Conditionally build tests, using the conds on which we submit tests to Helix #58511
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adding x64 on ARM64 support to installers #58059
    * NO MERGE *, area-Setup
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • More cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #58462
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58129
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • [libraries] Restrict ILLink Suppression xml to mobile platforms #58519
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add Http3LoopbackConnection.ShutdownAsync and use in AcceptConnectionAsync #58336
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • FileStream.Unix: improve DeleteOnClose when FileShare.None. #55327
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • File.*AllText* optimizations #58167
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AV on shutdown in finalizer thread #1487

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement Control Flow Guard annotations #1488
    area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • Initial round of clean up on Regex SRM #1486
  • Fix more regex tests for .NET Framework #1485

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet restore --no-dependencies is loading asset files from upstream project references in the latest .Net 6 preview #20556
  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts is detecting unexpected conflicts #20543
  • After upgrade from net6 preview 7 to rc1, build project which is created with net6 preview 7 with error "C:\Users\v-danche\RC1\before\myconsole\Program.cs(2,1): error CS0103: The name 'Console' does not exist in the current context [C:\Users\v-danche\RC1\before\myconsole\myconsole.csproj]" #20509

Closed

  • Update implicit global usings feature to address issues #19521
    6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Only warn about references that are actually needed at runtime #20567
    Area-Compatibility
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #20555
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/3.1.1xx] Remove blob feeds #20553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [6.0.1xx-rc1] Fix PlatformNotSupportedException for Windows (arm64) #20524
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Fix missing packaged shim after update #20391
    Servicing-approved, 5.0.4xx
  • Fix missing packaged shim after update #20390
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix missing packaged shim after update #20389
    Servicing-approved
  • Do not clear DOTNET_MODIFIABLE_ASSEMBLIES in startup hook (#20424) #20542
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet-watch ux changes (#20412) #20541
    Area-AspNetCore
  • dotnet-watch ux changes #20412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] [Backport] Allow optionally specifying an alternative package path when packing (#20451) #20465
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add platform descriminator to workload records #20484
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Fix cross-os symbol generation #20481
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Update `dotnet watch` description #20489
    Area-CLI
  • dotnet sln: Add error message for misplaced solution argument #18608
    Area-CLI
  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • Restore preferred packages functionality #19878
    Area-NuGet
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • [Blazor] Fixes for RC2 (main) #20252
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Open issue: non-negative assumption should apply to both Count and Length #5137

Closed

  • Should lambda expression or method group be considered convertible to `MulticastDelegate` if the delegate type cannot be inferred? #5124
  • Proposal: Improved InternalsVisibleToAttribute #1723

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove new handling of nullable value types in method type argument inference #5138

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .editorconfig file from parent directory ignored #56142
    17.1
  • CS0266 suggests invalid code fix #56141
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces SymbolFinder.FindReferencesAsync NullReferenceException #56133
  • Feature request: alternate update mechanism for vsix like nuget-feeds? #56119
  • Allow `EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles` to specify specific generators #56113
  • Assertion failed in AbstractMergeNestedIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider #56101

Closed

  • New EditorConfig UI Editor doesn't work for external EditorConfig files #53845
    17.0
  • EditorConfig UI doesn't reflect the correct current setting #54495
    17.0
  • new .editorconfig editor does not show code analyzer rules #55508
    17.0
  • EditorConfig UI not showing any information #54568
    17.0
  • Unable to build C# compiler in VS 2022. The process cannot access the file CSharpSyntaxGenerator.dll because it is being used by ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe #56125
  • API proposal: `IsAccessibleWithin` symbol extension method #56116
  • Navigation is broken in "Find References" result window #56123
  • Renaming of lambda parameter with 1 ref takes about 30 seconds #55400
    17.0
  • EditorConfig UI: Select language for Analyzers #53834
    17.0
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync cannot locate Microsoft.NET.Sdk #54796
    17.0
  • Overload resolution fails in complex scenario with Delegate overloads and extension methods #55691
    17.0
  • Lambda attributes + expression trees = missing metadata #53910
    17.0
  • `PEModuleBuilder.Translate(MethodSymbol, ...)` doesn't translate constructor of a native int type, causing a crash in later on #49845
    17.0
  • Add record struct classifications for EditorFeatures.Cocoa (VSMac) #56083
  • Code action preview shows "no issues found" even if there are conflicts or issues #56074

PullRequests

Created

  • Native Int: constant folding is executed at runtime rather than compile-time if the result depends on the size of native integers #56145
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1339482 #56144
    auto-merge
  • Add vscode workspace settings to the gitignore #56143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove legacy progression search #56140
    Area-IDE
  • Remove declaration-only-compilation from CompilationTracker #56139
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the HasCompilation flag. #56132
    Area-IDE
  • Move Static Members: Existing type #56131
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typo: Verson → Version #56115
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56117
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove dead code in the compilation tracker. #56134
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56138
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Only attempt to show the settings from the workspace if the editorcon… #56128
    Area-IDE

    Area-Compilers
  • Wait for the workspace to be initialized #56124
    Area-IDE

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56151

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56149

    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56147
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Improve the tooltip of Inheritance Margin #56026
    Area-IDE
  • Have add-using respect EditorBrowsable attributes. #55669
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0

  • More options refactoring #56089
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Change 'convert anonymous type to tuple' into a refactoring #50536
    Area-IDE
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • Source generators/timing #55892
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Preserve conversions on null literals before nullable type argument reinference #56022
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Inline diagnostics and intellicode cohesion #55095
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Errors

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 2 major bugs with autocompletion with razor editor in visual studio 2022 #36125
  • Wrong diagnostic reported in nested nested C#/HTML scenarios #36124
    17.0-Preview5
  • Smart indent can fail in HTML nested in C# scenarios #36123
    17.0-Preview5
  • Option to use old razor editor for visual studio 2022 #36121
  • Render Fragments Under Visual Studio 2022 Not Showing Up Under Intellisense #36120
  • Snippets don't work in Razor Editor #36117
  • PageTitle component breaks in .NET 6 RC1 Blazor Server after hot reload #36116
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #36106
  • An item with the same key has already been added. Key: Content-Language when using UseRequestLocalization and UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute #36105
  • CheckPasswordAsync throws The input is not a valid Base-64 string #36096
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis disposing connections while in use #36092
  • Find if session is expired with HttpContext #36090
    Discussions
  • Performance issue on for / loop in Blazor WASM #36095
  • JSON Patch - remove operation by index appears to throw JsonPatchException (... is out of bounds of the array size) despite not appearing to be out of bounds #36089
  • Control browserlink port or disable aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js #36085
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #36083
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef #36082
  • Perf improvement: mvc #36081
  • Quarantine WebHostFunctionalTests.LoggingConfigurationSectionPassedToLoggerByDefault #36079
  • Code generation for setting Blazor component parameters #36071
    7.0-preview1

Closed

  • UseDeveloperExceptionPage plain-text response should set charset #35954
    6.0-rc2
  • ASP.NET Core and SPAs in .NET 6 #27887
    6.0.0
  • Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore 5.0.0 is not compatible with net50 (.NETFramework,Version=v5.0). Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore 5.0.0 supports: netstandard2.1 (.NETStandard,Version=v2.1) #35552
  • RequestDelegateFactory should return "415 Unsupported Media Type" response when parameter binding and the request isn't JSON #35856
    6.0-rc2
  • RequestDelegateFactory should throw BadHttpRequestException when in development to make diagnosing handler issues easier #35858
    6.0-rc2
  • Unable to provide a global custom ErrorBoundary by subclassing the existing `ErrorBoundary` class #35504
    6.0-rc2
  • Hot reload 6.0.0-preview.3.21201.4 Blazor WASM + ASP.Net Core Hosted partially works #32993
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #36045
  • AddJwtBearer middleware support for JWKS without discovery document #36016
  • Windows Emoji + Blazor *.razor file #27664
  • Responsive flex layout is not working in Blazor Virtualize #35700
    Backlog
  • .NET 6, Preview 7: Setting title in WASM App #35973
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor - BrotliCompress msbuild task duplicate processing of files - causes lock exceptions #29529
  • "C# 10(preview) + ASP.NET Core Web App (.NET 6.0) + AppendTargetFrameworkToOutputPath=False" produce compilation error #36039
  • PersonalDataAttribute does not specify AttributeUsage. #32833
    .NET 7-Candidate
  • How to use Html.DisplayFor correctly ? #35991
  • [Perf] SoD Regression in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.dll #34736
    6.0-rc2
  • Strange dotnet watch output when editing files from VS2022 #35340
    6.0-rc2
  • Clean up dotnet watch output on rude edit #35341
    6.0-rc2
  • WSL2: running the app using dotnet watch and then pressing "Ctrl + Shift + R" doesn't do anything when in windows terminal or in the VS Code terminal #34478
    6.0-rc2
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-106070-.NET6 #36075
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #35963
  • Perf regression: json_actix #36013
  • DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware should set response status code from BadHttpRequestException #35857
    6.0-rc2
  • Improve RoleManager documentation #32005
    6.0.0
  • VS 2022 Preview 3.1 Template creates Minimal API for Blazor Server Hosted Project #35577
  • Upload CSV File in Blazor hast the wron Format of German "Umlaute" #35653
  • In-app IHostingStartup instances are not discovered/run when --applicationName is passed via args to WebApplication.CreateBuilder, e.g. from test projects #35956
    6.0-rc2
  • Ambiguous Map method with Minimal #35323

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Blazor Server Reconnection Mechanism #36126
    area-signalr, area-blazor
  • Run user defined hosted services before the server starts. #36122
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Properly reject non-json FromBody parameter binding #36118
    area-runtime
  • Update gitattributes to fix bootstrap CDN SRI #36115
  • Add nullable support to BindAsync #36114
  • Avoid using static NullabilityInfoContext #36112
  • [release/6.0] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36111
    area-infrastructure
  • New Hosted build pools #36110
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #36109
    area-runtime
  • Update ChromeDriver version #36107
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Program.cs #36103
    area-mvc
  • Store and reuse health status for health checks #36102
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #36100
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix root '<PageTitle>' not working when a default, static '<title>' is provided #36099
    area-blazor
  • Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36094
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Update npm dependencies #36088
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR] Add Http options to Negotiate metadata #36078
    area-signalr
  • Add code generation for setting Blazor component parameters #36074
    area-blazor, area-razor.compiler
  • Remove UseRouting from templates #36069
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Properly reject non-json FromBody parameter binding #35976
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Throw for bad requests intended for minimal route handlers in development #36072
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #36017
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix frame type exception message in Http3InMemory #36005
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix root '<PageTitle>' not working when a default, static '<title>' is provided #35982
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine `LoggingConfigurationSectionPassedToLoggerByDefault` #36080
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • PersonalDataAttribute should only apply to properties #36067
    breaking-change, area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • Throw for bad requests intended for minimal route handlers in development #36004
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Backport Fix issues with hosting startups #36076
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Fix null-ref for MSAL WASM Auth #36056
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Add myself to more CODEOWNERS areas #36073
    7.0-preview1
  • Add support for WithTags extension method (#35672) #36026
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix issues with hosting startups #36055
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Log time-taken more precisely #36066
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • Add minimal option to webapi template #36068
    area-mvc
  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35875
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Improve error messages for missing body and services #36064
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [WIP] Bootstrap v4 support #35981
    area-identity
  • Add Win11 helix-matrix/quarantine queue, remove win7/8 #36040
    area-infrastructure
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Use GetEndpoint extension method #35886
    area-mvc, area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Added support for Int64 and DateTime #35855
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Support platforms where crossgen2 is not available #35916
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Static web assets] Fix casing issues during parsing #35564
    area-mvc
  • Avoid pinning JSInterop code when unused #36036
    area-blazor
  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • WIP: Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A #2375

  • [Enhancement] Sliver #2363
  • The type or namespace name 'Shared' does not exist in the namespace #2359

  • [Bug] Button width doesn't size for icon #2356

Closed

  • Window11 cannot debug WinUI project in MAUI template [Bug] #2104
  • [Bug] Cannot build sln from template if was created with `-` in the name #1187

PullRequests

Created

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Make sure arguments & argumentpropagesnullability has same size #25854
  • Query/Sqlite: AddMonths and AddTicks translation may lead to small result discrepancies vs l2o #25851
  • SQLite: ValueGeneratedOnAdd doesn't work on GUID column that is not a key #25847
  • Cast error when using InMemoryDb (tests) and GetColumnType() #25844
  • Cosmos: Translate string.Equals with StringComparison.Ordinal #25842
  • Create period columns as hidden #25841
  • remove redundant null semantics terms involving non-null parameters #25838

Closed

  • Query/Test: northwind tests don't have predefined entity asserters #25834
    6.0.0
  • .UseSqlite : Does not apply HasQueryFilter correctly on "include" childrens properties #25800
  • ThenInclude after Take on a ICollection Property generate a wrong sql #23041
    6.0.0
  • Incorrect results when selecting reference collection navigation chain on keyless entity #21828
    6.0.0
  • SQLite: Unable to handle Take nested in Select #21078
    6.0.0
  • Query: chaining multiple collections of weak entities throws during compilation #17803
    6.0.0
  • Support backwards `OfType` #17364
    6.0.0
  • Query: "Value can not be null" in runtime for complex query with weak entities, SelectMany on navigation chain with DefaultIf Empty #13560
    6.0.0
  • [Always Encrypted] EF Core 5.0 Operand type clash : nvarchar(4000) is incompatible with decimal(19,3) #25713
    6.0.0
  • Add CodeGeneratedAttribute to migrations/snapshots #25820
  • How to compare json string when using JsonValueConverter #25823
  • Improve exception message for instance or inline value converter with compiled model #25738
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Why does my non-nullable navigation property have a nullable backing field? #23588
    6.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Add regression test for #23784 #25855
  • Query: Add regression test for #23658 #25853
  • SqlServer: Ignore Fks whose principal table data is not found #25852
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25848
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Reset unknown original value when current value is set #25837
  • Reuse some IExecutionStrategy instances. #25836

Merged

  • Fix to #25834 - Query/Test: northwind tests don't have predefined entity asserters #25849
  • Adding regression tests for some issues fixed earlier #25835
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25845
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Set the DbType on parameters wherever possible #25840
    providers-beware
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25825
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Be more explicit about which overloads of HasConversion to use with compiled model #25816
  • Configure requiredness based on NRT even if principal end might be ambiguous. #25831

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.5 #25730
    blocked
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.5-pre20210521085756 to 2.0.5 #25787
    closed-duplicate, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655
